roleset.name: put a stopper on
roleset.note: STOPPER-V NOTES: Automatically created based on 'feather'. Hand-corrected by Claire. Member of VNcls butter-9.9. (from stopper.01-v)

example.name: All arguments, unusual stopper
example.text: They stoppered this abyss with a sparkling, life-giving river.

example.name: Passive, descriptive
example.text: When the bottles are half filled with the media, [they]-1 are stoppered *-1 with cotton- wool and the top-end is wrapped with paper.
example.arg: When the bottles are half filled with the media
